name: CatRunner
description:
Hey there!

In this game, you are a cat trying to jump over obstacles (like the dino game in Chrome, but with cats).

There are four powerup types:

-Yarn: The ingame currency

-Bell: Doubles your score for a fixed time

-Catnip: Slows your speed down

-Fish: Gives you an extra life

You can also buy four differently coloured cats with the collected yarn.

This is my first shot at game developement, so feedback is greatly appreciated!

PS: My highscore is 7715. Can you beat that?

Anyways, thanks for playing!
